div.paragraph: Welcome to the second page exhibit in our style guide gallery. As in the first page, on this page you can see an example of various specialized elements.

The first element to take note of is the Cookie Consent widget. How this widget presents itself depends on the implementation as defined within the Website Materials associated to this account. It may present as a banner across the top of the page, or as a floating panel in one of the corners or in some other way.
At the top of the page you can see an example of the BackLink. This link will evoke the browser's back button causing the browser to return to the previous page.
There should be a Progress Bar to the left of this paragraph. It should be in vertical format, and should not display any progress as there is no contextual data associated with a style guide page.
And, finally, to the right you should see the Carousel. There are two panels currently configured, and it should display indicators so that you can reach either panel using the mouse.
